thread.title: Golden Meadow man accused of showing children porn, forcing 1 to
thread.title_full: Golden Meadow man accused of showing children porn, forcing 1 to - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Kelly Weston, Digital Content Producer
title: Golden Meadow man accused of showing children porn, forcing 1 to
text:
LAFOURCHE PARISH, LA (WVUE) - A Golden Meadow man was arrested Friday (Oct. 16) with felony child sex abuse of three children under the age of 13, according to Lafourche Parish Sheriff Craig Webre.
Raymond Taylor, 32, was booked with one count of sexual battery and two counts of indecent behavior with juveniles after an investigation that began in late September.
Deputies said three were involved in separate incidents of a sexual nature with Raymond Taylor, who allegedly showed them pornographic videos. In one case, Taylor allegedly forced a child to touch him in a sexual manner.
Detectives made contact with Taylor on Friday and questioned him about the incidents. After questioning, he was taken to the Lafourche Parish Detention Center in Thibodaux, where he remains in lieu of $130,000 bond.
